title: Pixel Camera Services update brings Night Sight in Snapchat to the Pixel 6 series
content:
Google rolled out the March Feature Drop for Pixel devices alongside the first stable Android 12L release earlier this month. The Feature Drop introduced a host of new software features, including Live Captions for calls, Night Sight in Snapchat, and more. At the time, the Feature Drop rolled out to all Pixel devices except for

The post Pixel Camera Services update brings Night Sight in Snapchat to the Pixel 6 series appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google has started rolling out an update for the Pixel Camera Services app via the Play Store which brings Night Sight in Snapchat to the Pixel 6 series.
